ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mdetf.d | |- D = ( N maDet R ) |
| 2 |  | mdetf.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mdetf.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mdetf.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mdetf | |- ( R e. CRing -> D : B --> K ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( D ` M ) e. K ) |
